summary:
Eva
------------------------------------------------------------------
Height 0.99 Weight 100
Location: Solitude Temple of the Divines
Default Outfit: Daedric Armor
Weapon: Daedric Battleaxe
Combat style: 2H Warrior
Perk: Full perk of Heavy Armor, Light Armor, One-handed,
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/njyTaZL.jpg[/img][/center]
Hello! My name is YuiH, I am from Taiwan.
So I can only speak a little English, sorry for my poor English

*This mod is stand-alone follower, so you don't need other mods to make her face like my image.*

This is maybe my [b]last personal character mod [/b]release, big thank to people who being support me!!

Demon girl - [b]Eva[/b]....
She is my first main character ever when I first play Skyrim, this image show her history:
[url=http://i.imgur.com/bd0UPnC.jpg][img]http://i.imgur.com/uPvFlsl.jpg[/img][/url]

When mod keep developing, her face keep changing, but still follow what I like with her face,
even I create so much character, I play her almost 90%.

Seem that image, I have been using the "[b]Heavy Metal Armor[/b]" from TERA mod for over 2 years,
and the horn on her head is from "[b]R18Pn 05 - Astaroth Suit for UNP and CBBE V3[/b]" also over 2 years,
[color=#b6b6b6][size=1](you also can download from here: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/14221/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/14221/?[/url] )
[/size][/color]
I thought about to add the horn in the mod but after Merura (my another character mod),
I find out people they want to put the armor whatever they want on the follower,
so if you like the horn, please download from there. :)

And about her eyes, "[b]MissAniThrope and chakaru11's True C Eyes[/b]" mod, this eyes is the best I ever used,
so shiny so beautiful, I only use this eyes mod even now, I can't find better in my taste, that is why my followers mod all use this eyes.

By the way the scarf is from "[b]Grimoas Scarf and Gugel[/b]" mod.
[color=#b6b6b6][size=1](from: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/17401/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/17401/?[/url] )
[/size][/color]
And the weapons is call "[b]Bloody Rynotis[/b]" mod.

Prototype of YuiH StandAlone Follower:
[img]http://i.imgur.com/2LtnpxU.jpg[/img]

Her face is my own personal taste, so I'm not sure she is pretty for every one,
also can said her face is prototype for all my character mod, but still I got the request, so I release her.

Well... hope you like her. ;)

[color=#e06666][size=5][b]Character
[/b][/size][/color][color=#ff0000][size=4]Eva
[/size][/color]
Height 0.99 Weight 100
[b]Location:[/b] Solitude Temple of the Divines
[b]Default Outfit: [/b]Daedric Armor
[b]Weapon: [/b]Daedric Battleaxe
[b]Combat style: [/b]2H Warrior
[b]Perk: [/b]Full perk of Heavy Armor, Light Armor, One-handed, Two-handed

[color=#e06666][size=5][b]Recommended Mod[/b][/size][/color]

[/url]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36992/?]SeveNBase a custom FemaleBodyReplacer[/url]

[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35327/?]SG Female Eyebrows[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/39821/?]HRK ENB[/url]

MissAniThrope and chakaru11's True C Eyes
Hair packs of TES IV Oblivion for Female Only

[color=#e06666][size=5]Change log[/size][/color]
2014.10.03 - Release.
